frame.name: Conferring_benefit
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Benefactor</fen> confers a <fen>Beneficial_situation</fen> to a <fen>Beneficiary</fen>. Unlike in Commerce_scenario, the recipient is not necessarily required to pay for the good or service that they receive. Therefore, the element of benevolence is profiled.
Dual FE-layer annotation:
<ex><fex name="Beneficial_situation">His presence</fex> at the summit did not <t>BENEFIT</t> <fex name="Beneficiary">diplomatic relations</fex> <fex name="Degree">in the slightest</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Benefactor">His</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="Beneficial_situation">The foundation's 50m donation</fex> <t>BENEFITS</t> the <fex name="Beneficiary">country's educational system</fex> <fex name="Degree">immensely</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Benefactor">The foundation's</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Benefactor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Benefactor</fen> is the person or thing that gives an advantage to the <fen>Beneficiary</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Beneficiary
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Beneficiary</fen> is person or thing that receives an advantage from the <fen>Benefactor</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Beneficial_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Beneficial_situation</fen> is the item or action that is given to or done for the <fen>Beneficiary</fen> by the <fen>Benefactor</fen>. A change of possession can, but does not have to occur.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The degree to which the <fen>Beneficiary</fen> gains an advantage from the <fen>Benefactor</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Domain</fen> describes the type of advantage that is conferred.
<ex><fex name="Domain">immigration</fex> <t>BENEFITS</t></ex> <ex><fex name="Domain">work</fex> <t>BENEFITS</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subset
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Subset</fen> of beneficial situations is selected from the set of beneficial situations in a specific domain, though the domain need not be explicitly named.
<ex><fex name="Subset">certain</fex> <fex name="Domain">immigration</fex> <t>BENEFITS</t></ex> <ex><fex name="Subset">hardly any</fex> <fex name="Domain">monetary</fex> <t>BENEFITS</t></ex> <ex><fex name="Subset">most</fex> <t>BENEFITS</t></ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: benefit.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an advantage or profit gained from something
